tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Smriti is an exceptional dentist, especially for Invisalign treatment. She combines kindness with a gentle approach, making every visit comfortable. Dr. Smriti's professionalism and attention to detail ensure excellent results. Her caring nature and clear explanations make the entire process smooth and stress-free. I highly recommend Dr. Smriti to anyone seeking top-notch dental care with a personal touch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: None
review:
Not often do you walk out of a clinic without having paid the basic consultation fee. This was my first visit to the Nanda Dental clinic and i must say the place is pretty welcoming and clean. *** ****** ** **** ** **** *** ********* *** explains the process with great ease. I just wanted an expert opinion on a few things before commencing with my treatment and luckily i got all my queries sorted. While i was leaving, i asked how much was the consultation and she replied saying i didn't have to pay anything. In spite of insisting her, she still didn't take a penny! This kind of behaviour is surprising especially when you show no signs of getting your treatment done from the same place! 
Some would call it a marketing jargon, for me it was sheer kindness. I'd update this review if and when i commence my treatment with them, until then loud cheers for the entire team! :)

P.S. - No, this isn't a paid review.

tags: None
review: Dr. Nanda was very professional and warm. Explained everything she was doing. Answered my questions. Provided great tips about dental hygiene. Did thourough dental exam. Dental cleaning was done gently *** *** ******* **** ********** Bill for exam, full mouth X-Ray and dental cleaning was more than reasonable. There was no push for unnecessary procedures or products. Facility and equipment were well maintained. Dr Nanda and her assistant wore gloves when working on my teeth to prevent any infection. She also examined my 17 month son earlier and give excellent tips for his dental hygiene. My family and I will definitely use her in the future!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from abnormal pain in my mouth and gums and joint areas near my eyes. No pattern but this could happen at any point of time during the day and frequency of having this pain was on weekly basis.  I visited multiple dentist but unfortunately no one was able to properly diagnose and suggest what can be done to ease the pain. Someone then recommended to go to Nanda Dental Clinic and meet Dr. Smriti over there. She was able to understand the issue in just one go/one visit and thereafter she suggested me to wear invasaligners. My treatment is still ongoing but I have had this pain only twice in last 21 weeks and that too for only an hour or so. I'm so pleased with the overall expertise she carries and the way she understood the issue. She is very approachable and reachable at any hour of the day.  Thank you Dr.Smriti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Straightening of teeth ( Invisalign ) - Removable option,
review: I began my invisalign treatment with Dr Smriti today, and it was smooth and effective. I had almost no wait time and the appointment took no longer than 40 minutes. She placed the attachments on my teeth and gave me clear instructions on how to use my invisalgner’s. She also was very patient in teaching me how to put on and remove my trays - which was super helpful! My experience with Dr Smriti on my invisalign treatment has been hassle free and very comfortable. If you have wanted to always get your teeth straightened - then this is the place!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Smriti and Dr Prashant are fantastic at providing Dental care every step of the way. They are friendly, caring and great at their jobs. I had visited them for a double extraction of wisdom teeth which was treated within twenty four hours of the first visit. I was also called in for a follow up the very next day. I did not wait more than five minutes for any appointment, and I was given proper instruction for post-extraction care. I am highly satisfied with the service and treatment offered at their clinic. I would recommend them for anyone looking for a hassle free, friendly and efficient dental care!! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Smiriti and Dr Prashant are very friendly, humble and polite personalities. They gave us a very honest and detailed explanation of all possible treatments with pros and cons of each treatment and the recommended procedure for the current situation. They took the time to explain every minute details and providing us with details of previous few surgeries done and their outcome. I never felt any kind of pressure from them to perform any specific procedure instead they both asked us to take time and get back to them with what we prefer. I am very satisfied with their valuable feedback and strongly recommend them. I am not exaggerating but if someone consults them, will definitely understand what I mentioned in my feedback. 
P.S: This is not a paid feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have had the good fortune of having Dr Smriti Nanda as my dentist. She is a thorough professional, her staff too is very welcoming.  
Dr Smriti is a such a  warm person and her beautiful smile and friendly demeanor puts one at ease. I am happy with my dental transformational journey with Invisalign under her supervision & highly recommend her.

tags: None
review:
This was my first visit to a dentist post several years and post searching out certain docs over practo. I had also tried for a nearby dentist but somehow no one was available that day in gk-2. Hence I fixed to try this clinic and was quite surprised with Professionalism and Friendliness of the staff and the Doctors. 
The clinic is well setup and neat and clean. She treated very well with no pain or disburtance and also gave headphones to listen to music while he fixed up by chipped teeth. Overall I was quite satisfied and will look to get my cavities also treated soon now. 
I shall recommend this place basis my first visit to Smriti Nanda clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today I went for a consultation with Dr Smriti regarding Invisalign treatment and regular dental checkup n cleaning process.  She explained the whole process of Invisalign in detail and with patience to make me understand the treatment required for me. She was very pleasant and gentle in checking my teeth properly. Loved the entire process and completely satisfied with my visit today. The clinic is very clean and the entire staff is very pleasant. I Highly recommend Nanda dental clinic .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Both Smriti and Prashant are very approachable. They respond to messages immediately and accommodate their patients as soon as possible. Their staff is also very friendly. Highly recommend this young doctor couple. Always a cheerful smile on their faces!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was scheduled for an extraction this Saturday. My pain had become unbearable. I called Dr Nanda and they immediately arranged for extraction. After the procedure, they followed up how am I feeling, explained all possible pain scenarios that one may face, clearly detailed recovery process and highlighted SOS medicines. Pretty impressed with the way they dealt with the extraction process as well.
I would recommend them for sure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Smriti and her husband are wonderful and have very warm personalities! I originally only visited for descaling and home whitening but I trusted them a lot and decided to think about having a crown made with them. 
They were very flexible around my traveling and Smriti fitted a temporary crown and was available on WhatsApp whilst i was out of Delhi in case any problems arose. 
The experience and quality of treatment i received was higher than that of any dentists I had previously boosted in UK/Ireland.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: It was an absolute delight contrary to common belief of the stress of being in a dentist’s chair.. she explained the situation and handled it very well .. I had visited for my 7 year old as his permanent teeth have started coming but the milk teeth have not shed yet, and was expecting she would recommend extraction. However she observed and recommended to not go through the trauma and stress and was not required. Very friendly and helped calming not just the patient but also the stressed parents. Highly recommend.
